data.text:
Krista Allen was born in Ventura, California, United States, on April 5, 1971, is an American actress. Young Krista Allen first started her career as a model for the Texas Bikini Team during its inaugural season in 1992. She made her big screen debut in fantasy comedy film Liar Liar (1997) in role as Woman in Elevator. She got her television debut in movie Emmanuelle 1: Queen of the Galaxy (First Contact) (1994) in role as Emmanuelle. Krista's breakthrough performance came as Billie Reed in NBC soap opera Days of Our Lives (1996-1999).

Best Movies

She played Emmanuelle in film series Emmanuelle in Space (1994):

Emmanuelle 1: Queen of the Galaxy (First Contact)

Emmanuelle 2: A World of Desire

Emmanuelle 3: A Lesson in Love

Emmanuelle 4: Concealed Fantasy

Emmanuelle 5: A Time to Dream

Emmanuelle 6: One Final Fling

Emmanuelle 7: The Meaning of Love

She was nominated for the Burbank International Film Festival Award for Best Actress and she won a IndieFEST Film Award of Merit Special Mention for Leading Actress for her role as Andromeda in comedy film Eleven Eleven (2018).

She was nominated for the East Europe International Film Festival Fusion Award for her role as Suzanne in comedy movie For the Hits (2021).

She won the Silver State Film Festival Award for Best supporting Actress - Feature Film for her role as Jewel in action film Shadows (2021).

Totally Blonde (2001) romantic comedy as Meg Peters

The Haunted Sea (1997) horror as 2nd Mate Johnson

Black Widow (2010) thriller as Jennifer

Best TV Shows

She played Billie Reed in NBC soap opera Days of Our Lives (1996-1999) in 41 episodes.

Baywatch (2000-2001) action drama series as Jenna Avid

Charmed (2001) The WB fantasy drama series as The Oracle

What About Brian (2006-2007) ABC comedy drama series as Bridget Keller

The Starter Wife (2008) USA Network romantic comedy series as Eve

She had recurring role as Jennifer Bell in CTV drama series The L.A. Complex (2012).

Mistresses (2014) ABC soap opera as Janine Winterbaum

Significant Mother (2015) The CW sitcom as Lydia Marlowe

The Bold and the Beautiful (2021-2023) CBS soap opera as Taylor Hayes

Facts

She majored in English from Austin (TX) Community College.

Has one brother, Dalton Earl Allen, Jr.

Has Portuguese, English, Irish, Scottish, German, Dutch and Welsh ancestry.

She is a vegan.

Fan of Lucille Ball and Gilda Radner.

She is also a certified yoga instructor.

Spokesman for the non-profit organization R.I.S.E. & Stand.

Lives in Los Angeles, California, United States.

Relationships

She dated Nathan Fillion (2015-2020), Chris Jaymes (2006), George Clooney (2002-2004), David Spade (2001-2002) and Victor Webster (1999-2000).

She was married to:

Mams Taylor (2010-2012)

Justin Morritt (1996-1999) they have one son, Jacob Nolan Moritt
